name: Fire Gun Up Strike
description:
Counter fight command adventure is the latest and ultimate unique crime shooting action is designed for you. Experience the most modern terrorist combat with specialized warfare weapons. This is extreme best FPS shooting game among the real terrorist killing simulation games. New city gun strike command war 3D is the best entertaining game for the modern users of 2017. If you are a real fan of Army gun shoot strike war games then this super gangster strike command action battle is only for you. the dangerous gang of skewer is entered in the city building and you are now in the city of the modern city. Your enemies are very dangerous and you can be careful with them. So grab your deadly sniper and enter the battle arena. Find enemies who are hidden in different spots. Shoot and kill all enemies by using your great sniper skills and you are super action hero of this adventure.

In this FPS terrorists shooting strike 3D adventure game, you main mission is to find the militant enemies with your powerful bullet gun. Initially you have to fly helicopter to enter the huge industrial area and then start fighting against enemies to clear the area from criminal skewer. Search all terrorists carefully and shoot down with accurate shooting skills to clear the mission within the specified period of time. If you can not complete your mission, start again. Modern counter fight command adventure 3d game contains multiple challenging and interesting missions you need to finish the level by killing all enemies to enter the next level and earn more points. If you do not want more points as compared to body shoot, these extra points will help you to purchase new powerful gun. So complete all missions to get the super action hero of this army gun strike command shooting adventure game.


How to play:
-Enter On the game Area
-Press Start Button to Start the Game
-Tap button to move left and right
-Tap fire button to kill the enemies

Feature of game:
-Incredible 3D graphics and intuitive touch controls
-Multiple challenging and amazing missions
-Beautiful city industrial area
-Realistic animation
-Real gun fire sounds
-Different camera angle to find the hidden gangster
-Exciting but challenging game play
-It will train you as a professional shooter
-Realistic riffles and gun for shooting criminal and terrorists.
